text: Rosso is a major city in southwestern Mauritania. It is the capital of the Trarza region. It is at the top of the Senegal River. The town is 204 km south of the capital Nouakchott. ==History== Rosso was the capital of the Emirate of Trarza before it was taken over by France. ==References== Category:Cities in Mauritania
title: Rosso
